shrimp.name: Wolff
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Wolff diffuse model for smooth dielectric surfaces, based in the paper "Improved Diffuse Reflection Models for Computer Vision", by Lawrence B. Wolff, Shree K. Nayar, and Michael Oren. The "ior" parameter usually should be in the [1.3,2.0] range. The diffuse color value is passed to the "aov_surfacecolor", and the diffuse value to the "aov_diffuse" AOV presets.
